title: Investigate rebel supply routes
description: Deploy reconnaissance teams to Yavin 4 to investigate suspected rebel supply routes.

title: Survey hidden rebel bases
description: Conduct aerial surveys on Dantooine to locate hidden rebel bases.

title: Intercept rebel communications
description: Set up surveillance on Sullust to intercept rebel communications.

title: Monitor rebel movements
description: Establish observation posts on Kashyyyk to monitor rebel movements.

title: Capture rebel operatives
description: Launch a raid on Geonosis to capture known rebel operatives.

title: Infiltrate rebel cell
description: Send agents to Ryloth to infiltrate and dismantle a rebel cell.

title: Retrieve stolen Imperial data
description: Recover stolen data from a rebel outpost on Mustafar.

title: Destroy rebel outpost
description: Eliminate a rebel stronghold discovered on Felucia.

title: Track rebel fleet movements
description: Deploy Star Destroyers near Eadu to track rebel fleet movements.

title: Interrogate captured rebel agents
description: Question detained rebels on Lothal for intelligence on rebel leadership.

title: Disable rebel sabotage networks
description: Root out sabotage cells operating on Cularin.

title: Scout rebel asteroid hideouts
description: Deploy probe droids to scan asteroid belts near Hoth for rebel hideouts.
